properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , NICKNAME , ADDRESS , EMAIL , PROFILE , PHONE , STATUS , SNS_KEY FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , NICKNAME , ADDRESS , EMAIL , PHONE , SNS_KEY ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_NAME , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , NICKNAME , ADDRESS , EMAIL , PHONE , SNS_KEY ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_NO.NEXTVAL , '홍길동' , 'user99' , 1234 , ? , '서울시' , ? , ? , ? )
